articles.title: Kongratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Delegations of governments, political parties, organizations and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from August 10 to 15 to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their full-length pictures and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They included delegations of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, the Taekwon-Do Association of Cambodia and the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar.
					
					 They also included the former prime minister of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh who is minister of Civil Aviation and Tourism of Bangladesh, the director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, the manager of Snow Tour and Tourist Company Ltd, of Myanmar, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, the chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, the chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar sent a floral basket on behalf of the Myanmar government.
					
					 An international school in Myanmar, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin, the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd. and the chairperson of the Emperor Group, Hong Kong of China,  and the chief secretary of the Zhonghwa Energy Fund and the Swedish honorary consul in Myanmar sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions.
					
					 A deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are not only the eternal fathers of the Korean people but also close friends and benefactors of the Cambodian people.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said the exploits of Korea's liberation by Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, will be immortal.

articles.title: Rason International Trade Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Rason International Trade Exhibition Held
Rason, August 23 (KCNA) -- The 5th Rason International Trade Exhibition took place in Rason City from Aug. 20 to 23.
					 Displayed in the exhibition were more than 600 kinds of electric and electronic products, foodstuff, daily necessities, medicines and others presented by the DPRK, Russia, Germany, Dominica, Italy, China, Canada and other countries.
					
					 Officials and people in Rason City and foreigners visited the venue of the exhibition.
					
					 During the exhibition there were exchange of views to expand cooperation, exchange and trade transactions in an all-round-way among companies of different countries and a discussion on the investment in the Rason Economic Trade Zone.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats South Korean Team
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats South Korean Team
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's team beat its south Korean rival to advance into the semi-finals in the 2015 Asian U-19 Women's Football Championship. 
					 The championship began in Nanjing of China on Aug. 18. It brought together eight teams of the DPRK, Uzbekistan, Australia, etc. 
					
					 Divided into two groups, they played league matches. 
					
					 In the Group B the DPRK team beat its Thai rival 5:0 on Aug. 19 and its Iranian rival 9:0 on Aug. 21. 
					
					 The DPRK team beat the south Korean team 1:0 on Sunday.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark Day of Songun
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark Day of Songun
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- New stamps (one sheet and one sheetlet) were issued in the DPRK to mark the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership (August 25, 1960). 
					 Printed on their upper part are letters "Celebration of the 55th anniversary of the great leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership".
					
					 The sheet shows an image of leader Kim Jong Il, the Songun brilliant commander who performed undying feats for the country and revolution, the era and history under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The sheetlet carries paintings showing the tireless efforts paid by Kim Jong Il to strengthen the Korean People's Army into the invincible armed forces.

articles.title: Economic Progress Made in Frontline Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Economic Progress Made in Frontline Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- People in the frontline areas of the DPRK are pushing ahead with the production and construction, while keeping themselves in full readiness for action.
					 In Kangwon Province and Kaesong City a signal progress has been made in their regional economic development.
					
					 On August 21 alone, the employees of the Kaesong Songdo Garment Factory topped their daily production assignment 150 percent, with the high spirit of retaliation to the provokers.
					
					 Such economic successes were also reported from North Hwanghae and South Hwanghae provinces.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
Samjiyon, August 23 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of women's union across the country made study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from Aug. 18 to 23 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac, on the shore of Lake Samji, at the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and before a mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the Paektusan Secret Camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the then police post of the Japanese imperialists, post office, etc. in the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 Visiting Chongbong and Konchang Bivouacs after going through the Tableland of Junghung, they went round such historical places as sites of the headquarters and campfire, the Spring Site in Poso-ri and Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and visited the Samjiyon Grand Monument and revolutionary sites on the shore of Lake Samji.
					
					 They marched along the Kapsan-Musan guard road to visit the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and climbed Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and looked round historic relics showing his childhood.
					
					 They held an oath-taking meeting before birthplace.
					
					 They conducted colorful political and cultural activities during the study tour.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on Traditions of Invincible KPA
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on Traditions of Invincible KPA
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- All the men and officers of the Korean People's Army frontline large combined units are now in full readiness to deal telling blows to the provokers on orders of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					 It is the traditions of the invincible Paektusan army to punish any aggressors without mercy, said Ra Yong Sun, vice-director of the Scientific Research Department of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The heroic seamen of the KPA sank and damaged 10-odd enemy warships in a fierce skirmish which occurred in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Our servicepersons destroyed with strong strikes the military posts and barracks of the enemies in the area of the Military Demarcation Line all at once whenever they made provocations by firing bullets and shells toward the DPRK side.
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling case gives a glimpse of the KPA's resolute and merciless counteraction.
					
					 Nevertheless, the enemies, oblivious of their past shameful defeats, provoked the DPRK again by firing shells on its military posts. 
					
					 The heroic KPA will sweep away the reckless provokers to the last one at once when an order for attack is given by the Supreme Commander.

articles.title: Provokers Will Have to Pay Dearly: DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Provokers Will Have to Pay Dearly: DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation prevails over the Korean Peninsula due to the anti-DPRK military provocations by the south Korean forces.
					 Tough measures taken at the emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea are quite proper for the prevailing situation, Pak Jong Won, an official of University of National Economy, told KCNA.
					
					 The measures are aimed at safeguarding the sovereignty and peace of the country from the reckless provocations of the enemies for aggression on the DPRK, he said, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK has consistently made patient efforts to defend peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and improve the worsened north-south relations.
					
					 This year alone, it took a series of important steps to remove the danger of war, ease tensions and create peaceful atmosphere on the peninsula, in response to the patriotic appeal made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					 But the U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces answered it with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises and psywar against the DPRK. They will have to pay dearly for such action.
					
					 The present situation proves itself that peace can never settle in the Korean Peninsula as long as the warmongers remain in power, said Ri Son Hyang, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 Under this situation, toughest military countermeasures are the one and only recipe for those warmongers, she said, adding that the DPRK would teach them what the real war is.

articles.title: Coal Miners Boost Production with Hatred against Warmongers
articles.content:
Coal Miners Boost Production with Hatred against Warmongers
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The coal miners in the DPRK have turned out in a campaign to boost production with the hatred against the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 Taking the lead in this campaign are the coal mines in different parts of the country including Chonnae, Tukjang, Kangdong, Munchon, Samchon and Toksan areas.
					
					 Kim Hak Chol, a coal miner of the Toksan Coal Mine, told KCNA that he has carried out his daily quota by 200 percent in the spirit of mercilessly annihilating those warmongers.

articles.title: Hatred at Provokers Gears up Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Hatred at Provokers Gears up Production in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The working citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now effecting innovations in the economic construction, determined to wipe out the south Korean military warmongers.
					 It is their fixed stand that the socialist construction should be continued until midnight today even if a war may break out tomorrow.
					
					 Coal mines across the country have overfulfilled their daily production plans while railway workers ensure the carriage of freight in a responsible manner in the same spirit as displayed by the heroic engine drivers during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Such upswing is also witnessed at light industrial establishments and foodstuff factories, including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Jongbangsan Foodstuff Factory.

articles.title: DPRK Civilians Take Active Part in Assisting Army
articles.content:
DPRK Civilians Take Active Part in Assisting Army
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The spirit of assisting the army is growing stronger among civilians in the frontline areas of the DPRK in a quasi-state of war.
					 Han Sang Jun, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial People's Committee, told KCNA:
					
					 The inhabitants in the province will stand in the same trench with the servicepersons when the time has come for decisive battles. In the last period of the Fatherland Liberation War, the provincial people heroically struggled to provide ammunitions and war supplies to the front.
					
					 Such spirit can be felt in Kaesong City and North Hwanghae Province, too.
					
					 Jo Jun Hak, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial Rural Economy Committee, said that the agricultural workers in the province are ready to turn out in the life-and-death struggle, together with the servicepersons.
					
					 In Kaesong, a frontline city, many citizens were seen handing over aid materials to military vehicles running toward the front.
					
					 Kim Song Un, an old man residing in Tokam-dong of the city, said that he wanted to offer the servicepersons on a high alert the aid materials as well as various foodstuff prepared for his sixtieth birthday.

articles.title: DPRK will Never Pardon Provokers: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK will Never Pardon Provokers: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Never to be pardoned are the south Korean puppet group of traitors going busy with igniting a war of aggression while swimming against the unanimous desire of all the compatriots for peace on the Korean Peninsula and national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If gunfire sounds under the prevailing situation, it will lead to a fierce confrontation between justice and injustice and between patriots and traitors and a final settlement of accounts between good and evil.
					
					 The DPRK's final decisive war will be a sacred one of justice for completely removing the source of a war from this land and bringing durable peace.
					
					 The DPRK already made every preparation for it.
					
					 It has made full preparations for any sort of war to be chosen by the enemies and rounded off the most perfect operation plan for destroying the enemies in just one battle.
					
					 Under the care of the brilliant commanders, the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army has become an elite one which has won only victories in the fierce guerilla warfare amid snowstorms and in the hard-fought war with the imperialist allied forces and in decades of confrontation with the enemies. It is also a matchless army with powerful strike means and invincible war methods capable of coping on its own initiative with any sort of confrontation including a local war with the use of conventional weapons, an all-out war, electronic warfare and a nuclear war.
					
					 The army characterized by violence and corruption cannot match the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army.
					
					 The DPRK's strike will turn the enemies' strongholds into the sea of flames, completely destroying them at a stroke, leading the battle to final victory.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Ultra-Right Conservative Media's Anti-DPRK Rubbish
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Ultra-Right Conservative Media's Anti-DPRK Rubbish
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Channel A and MBC of south Korea insulted the loyalty of the Korean people by fabricating a strange "decree" which they claimed was published by the DPRK last year and said this or that about those allowed to enter the Pyongyang Home for the Aged.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is the fabrication and invectives that only the money-grabbers of south Korea can make as they are apt to sell and buy people's minds and personalities with money.
					
					 The "decree" touted by the ultra-right conservative media was an absurd one that the DPRK has never published nor can do. Therefore, the "decree" is a third-rate fabrication cooked up by conspirators who are getting hell bent on the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Thanks to the noble politics of love for the people pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea which gives top priority to the interests of the people, while regarding them as absolute, the people's dream and ideal are being translated into reality in the DPRK.
					
					 The report of the conservative media are no more than a politically-motivated provocation which tarnished the dignity of the great party and seriously insulted the loyalty of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK for the party. 
					
					 Their ill-boding talks are deteriorating the inter-Korean relations and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 It is shame and disgrace of the nation that those in the guise of media persons mislead the public opinion with false stories.

articles.title: Minju Joson Exposes True Colors of Park Geun Hye as Confrontational Maniac
articles.content:
Minju Joson Exposes True Colors of Park Geun Hye as Confrontational Maniac
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The politically-motivated military provocations of the south Korean military warmongers are manipulated by Park Geun Hye who always let loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK while trumpeting about the "north's provocation", says Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary.
					 Her invectives fully revealed the true colors as a heinous confrontational maniac as they are undisguised attempt to escalate confrontation with the north, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The provocateur pushing the north-south relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe is the Park Geun Hye group busying itself with inventing a pretext for igniting a war against the DPRK together with the U.S.
					
					 By origin, Park is a rare confrontational maniac more heinous than traitor Lee Myung Bak who cooked up the Cheonan warship sinking case, the hideous conspiratorial charade, and took the "May 24 step" on that pretext, totally bedeviling the north-south relations.
					
					 Park called for intensifying Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises while vociferating about "threat of new genre" from someone, regardless of time and place. This is, in fact, a declaration of war to hurt compatriots in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is talking about ill-intentioned "dialogue" whenever an opportunity presents itself, giving an impression that she is interested in unification. This is nothing but deception to conceal her true colors as confrontational maniac and prop up the shaking ruling system.
					
					 If the Park group ignites a war against the north, trumpeting about the "north's provocation", all the service personnel and people of the DPRK will never miss the opportunity but blow up the citadel of aggressors.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally in Seoul Demands Peace
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally in Seoul Demands Peace
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of various circles held a candlelight rally at Chonggye Plaza of Seoul on Saturday to demand the realization of peace against war as regards the situation on the Korean Peninsula that has reached the brink of war following the resumption of the anti-DPRK broadcasts for psywar by the south Korean puppet group.
					 Speakers said that the present situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached extremely dangerous one. If a war ignites on this land, the people would suffer from the damage, they added.
					
					 They denounced the military authorities for talking about a "retaliatory proposal", adding that the people hope peace, not war.

articles.title: S. Korean Children Involved in War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Children Involved in War Drills
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group of traitors hell-bent on provoking a war against the DPRK is hurling even children into war drills.
					 According to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang, the Taegu city authorities advanced the "plan of civilians' participation in 2015 Ulji exercises" on Aug. 16 and sent official notices to various organs including the association of "children's house" and demanded it let even children participate in the drills.
					
					 Hundreds of children were taken to a military exercise ground near the Taegu City Office to do shooting, carrying gears and camouflage from Aug. 17 to 20.
					
					 The residents there, bursting their anger, urged the office to stop the human rights abuses against children.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Policy against Reunification under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Policy against Reunification under Fire
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group's anti-reunification moves for confrontation with the fellow countrymen is rejected by the people in south Korea.
					 It is reported that most of the people negatively estimated the puppet Preparatory Committee for Unification according to an opinion poll conducted by the Reunification Association of the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice among civil reunification movement organizations some days ago.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors is dreaming of achieving "unification of social systems" though the truth of its policy against reunification was brought to light.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Discloses Corrupt Situation of Puppet NA
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Discloses Corrupt Situation of Puppet NA
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBC on Aug. 18 aired the situation of the puppet National Assembly marred with irregularities and corruption.
					 Lawmakers are under investigation by prosecutors on the charge of dereliction of their duties and sexual abuse on women, and exercised the power in the course of getting their children and relatives have jobs, the broadcasting said.
					
					 The NA is turning into a hotbed of crimes, irregularities and corruption, the broadcasting said, adding 38 lawmakers were under investigation and taken to justice for various kinds of scandals.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Sinister Military Scheme under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Sinister Military Scheme under Fire
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers ran amuck for confrontation, firing shells to the area of the DPRK's side. This is a clear reminder of the enemies' moves to ignite a new war that has entered the practical phase.
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is the ill-boding military attempt of the Park Geun Hye group to ignite a war and achieve the wild ambition for stifling the DPRK by force by all means through high-intensity military provocation with the backing of its American master.
					
					 What became clearer through the recent incident is that the touch-and-go military tension prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is caused by the U.S. new war scenario.
					
					 The U.S. hurls the south Korean puppet forces as a shock brigade for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and carrying out the war against the north out of its ambition to stifle the DPRK by force at any cost.
					
					 The situation proves that the DPRK was very right when it judged that the U.S. is plotting to make a surprise preemptive attack on the north after amassing aggressive armed forces on the peninsula under the pretext of the joint military exercises.
					
					 Under the prevailing grave situation, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK were put on full combat readiness to retaliate against the enemies' strike and foil their ambition to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian and Beninese Parties Denounce War Provocation by U.S. and S. Korea
articles.content:
Russian and Beninese Parties Denounce War Provocation by U.S. and S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Political Executive Council of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia and the Socialist Party of Benin made public statements on August 22 and 21 in denunciation of the war provocation against the DPRK by the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities. 
					 The statement of the Russian party expressed indignation and concern over the extremely dangerous situation on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are bitterly denounced by the world as they intentionally pushed the situation to the brink of war, it said, and went on:
					
					 It is a trite method employed by the U.S. imperialists to invent a pretext for invasion of a sovereign state by cooking up a shocking case. 
					
					 The sanctions and blackmail persisted by the U.S. and its followers against the peace-loving DPRK can never check its political and economic development. 
					
					 The U.S. can neither startle nor bring to knees the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are well aware of what a war is like. 
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin in its statement fully supported the measure of the DPRK to let the frontline large combined units of the Korean People's Army move to a war footing and to put the area along the front on semi-state of war. It expressed firm belief that the service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely win the final victory in the struggle to defend sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Provocations
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Provocations
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of Koreans in China bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialists and their stooge Park Geun Hye group of traitors for their reckless politically-motivated military provocations against the DPRK on Aug. 21 and 22.
					 Paek Kyong Hyon, chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, made public an article titled "Let us wipe out Park Geun Hye and south Korean puppet military warmongers bringing clouds of a war".
					
					 Kim Song Mi, chairperson of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, issued a statement titled "Let us resolutely smash war provocation moves of U.S. imperialists and their stooge Park Geun Hye group of traitors".
					
					 Kim Yong Nyo, chairperson of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, wrote an article titled "Let us wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique with shower of bullets and achieve the country's reunification at an early date".

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK Government Memorandum
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK Government Memorandum
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 15 in support of the memorandum issued by the government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The statement said that the memorandum highly praised the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for Korea's liberation and the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule by leading the 20 year-long hard-fought anti-Japanese war to victory.
					
					 He worked heart and soul for national reunification till the last moments of his life after setting it as the supreme national task since the very day the country was divided by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Kim Jong Il directed all his energies to achieving national reunification and successfully carried forward the cause of national reunification of the President.
					
					 The cause of the President and Kim Jong Il are being carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The memorandum concluded when all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad glorify the feats of the President and Kim Jong Il for Korea's liberation and the sacred cause of national reunification and advance dynamically under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, the historic cause of national reunification is sure to be accomplished and the great heyday of national prosperity to be ushered in the Korean land.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Order Supported by Political Figures of Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Order Supported by Political Figures of Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, and A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who is chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, made public statements on August 22 in support of the order of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Sh. Shabdolov in his statement said that the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan fully supports the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the dangerous war provocative moves of the U.S. and south Korea and strongly demands they stop at once the joint military drills against the DPRK and moves to ignite a war. 
					
					 The DPRK's measures are the most righteous ones to defend peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 A. Usupbayev said he fully supports the righteous measures of the DPRK to defend its sovereignty, dignity, peace and stability and the world progressive parties and peoples always stand by the Korean people.

articles.title: Foreign Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Hostile Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Hostile Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations made public statements on August 21 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their hostile moves against the DPRK. 
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said that the DPRK declared to open a wide avenue to independent reunification by bringing about great change in the north-south relations and made every possible effort for it.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities cooked up the "north's shelling" incident and fired dozens of shells into the area of the DPRK, the statement added. 
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association and the Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and liberation of Korea in a joint statement said the dangerous provocation by the south Korean authorities on the Korean Peninsula is a grave threat to peace and security on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and the world. 
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said:
					
					 The bellicose pro-U.S. traitorous group of Park Geun Hye should clearly know that they would meet a miserable end if they persist in the criminal and provocative moves for a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 We fully support the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un to let the frontline large combined units of the Korean People's Army move to a war footing and to put the area along the front on semi-state of war.

articles.title: Special Issue of Bulletin "Star of Independence" Released in UK
articles.content:
Special Issue of Bulletin "Star of Independence" Released in UK
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a special issue of bulletin "Star of Independence" on August 7, ahead of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 It carried different articles with the picture of President Kim Il Sung making his address at a rally for welcoming him on his triumphant return to the homeland. 
					
					 An article said that the 20 year-long anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander and gifted strategist, resulted in liberating Korea from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 Another article said that true to Kim Il Sung's noble intention Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and the revolution, the country and its people despite rigorous difficulties of history with his outstanding idea and leadership over half a century since his start of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il is victoriously advancing thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, the article added.

articles.title: Japan's History of Aggression Should Not Repeat: Bulgarian Paper
articles.content:
Japan's History of Aggression Should Not Repeat: Bulgarian Paper
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The August 1-15 issue of the Bulgarian paper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo carried an article.  
					 It is 70 years since the defeat of Japan which inflicted untold mishaps upon the Asian people, dreaming of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere."
					
					 History never forgets the brutal atrocities committed by the Japanese militarists who imposed huge misfortune and pain upon mankind.
					
					 Victims are still suffering from the damage.
					
					 The international community is urging Japan to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 Far from honestly admitting their history of aggression and behaving with discretion, Japan is working hard to become a military giant, denying its past crimes.
					
					 This is just the picture of Japan 70 years since its defeat.
					
					 The history of aggression should not repeat.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Measure Supported by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Measure Supported by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign figures issued statements in support of the DPRK's just measure as regards the prevailing serious situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said on Aug. 21 that he recognizes the measure taken at the emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea as the just self-defensive measure and strongly urges the south Korean authorities to stop at once the reckless politically-motivated military provocation on behalf of the leadership of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, on Aug. 22 urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop at once the psychological warfare broadcasts, leaflet scattering operations and other politically-motivated military provocation against the dignified DPRK and make an apology for them.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said in a statement on Aug. 22 that he extends full support to the friendly Korean people on behalf of the party, expressing belief that victory is in store for them in the sacred war for defending the destiny of the nation and global peace.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-DPRK Friendship Association, on Aug. 21 strongly urged the south Korean authorities to accept the DPRK's just demand without fail and stop acts of escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They included a meeting and film show in Venezuela, photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria, reading session in Uganda and round-table talks in Indonesia from August 10 to 16.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos introducing successes made by the Korean army and people in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean films including "Masikryong Ski Resort", "Arms of Korea" and "Pyongyang Today" were shown at the film shows.
					
					 A Venezuelan political party figure and the chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the President led the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and accomplished the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 A deputy principal of Kitante Primary School in Kampala City of Uganda said that the President led the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and opened up an avenue to genuine freedom, independence and national rebirth for the Korean people.
					
					 The manager of an Indonesian company said that exploits the President, the benefactor of the national rebirth and peerless patriot, performed by liberating the country will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Mongolia, Nigeria and Slovakia from August 12 to 14 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The chairman of the Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association said:
					
					 Korea's liberation marks a historic turning point for the Korean people in carving out their destiny.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated the country through a hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle and led the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' aggression to victory.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said:
					
					 The President who embarked on the road of the revolution in his teens fathered the Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and achieved the country's liberation through the armed struggle.
					
					 The exploits performed by the President by opening up a new era of the national liberation struggle in colonial countries will be immortal.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea said that Korean people will certainly accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche by dint of Songun under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Slovakia.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place by a company of Myanmar, four companies of Thailand and a company in Enugu State, Nigeria on August 13 and 14 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Participants watched Korean films including "Arms of Korea" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Military Provocation Denounced by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Military Provocation Denounced by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations denounced the south Korean puppet group's military provocation.
					 The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its statement on Aug. 22 said that moves of the south Korean puppets and their master U.S. for igniting a war are very dangerous ones and they were defeated in a war against the DPRK liberated from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 The "Workers' House" of Iran in a statement on Aug. 21 strongly urged the south Korean authorities to halt the psychological warfare against the DPRK at once as demanded by it and remove all means for psychological warfare.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in its statement on Aug. 21 said that the war-thirsty U.S. has stooped to all sorts of means and methods to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies in a joint statement on Aug. 21 termed the psywarfare against the DPRK the heinous politically-motivated military provocation to bring down its ideology and social system and usurp its power.
